metadata.name: Antiques Roadshow
metadata.summary: Some of the country’s leading specialists offer free appraisals of antiques and collectibles.
metadata.description: In each hour-long episode of Antiques Roadshow, some of the country’s leading specialists offer free appraisals of antiques and collectibles. Roadshow’s cameras capture tales of family heirlooms and yard-sale bargains.
metadata.keywords: PBS, Antiques Roadshow, antiques, art, nonfiction
